title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 165.1 - Photographs on licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 165.1 - Photographs on licenses

State Regulations
(a) Every
licensee shall affix his photograph to the license in the appropriate space
indicated thereon and subscribe beneath or alongside the said photograph the
date it was taken. (b) No
photograph shall be or remain affixed to a license which photograph was taken
more than four years prior to the date it was so affixed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
165.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
